results.name: default/wordpress-mysql-deployment-7c868f8-h7qzr

error.Text: the last termination reason is Error container=mysql pod=wordpress-mysql-deployment-7c868f8-h7qzr

results.details:
Error: The MySQL container in the pod "wordpress-mysql-deployment-7c868f8-h7qzr" terminated with an error.

Solution: 
1. Check pod logs: `kubectl logs wordpress-mysql-deployment-7c868f8-h7qzr -c mysql`.
2. Verify MySQL config and credentials.
3. Ensure MySQL image is correct.
4. Check resource limits.
5. Restart pod: `kubectl delete pod wordpress-mysql-deployment-7c868f8-h7qzr`.
